channel.title: Comments on: Moving to Amazon S3 now

item.title: By: S3 Browser
item.dc:creator: S3 Browser
item.description:
There are a number of tools that can help you to move files to Amazon S3 storage.
Some of them allows you to simplify Amazon S3 integration even more by allowing you to mount Amazon S3 Buckets as a virtual drive. Check out TntDrive ( www.tntdrive.com ) for example.
item.content:encoded:
There are a number of tools that can help you to move files to Amazon S3 storage.

Some of them allows you to simplify Amazon S3 integration even more by allowing you to mount Amazon S3 Buckets as a virtual drive. Check out TntDrive ( http://www.tntdrive.com/ ) for example.

item.title: By: Hang
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Things looks good so far, it seems backup to S3 is a pretty good solution as data gets into S3 is free, and you know, backups are seldom being read.
item.content:encoded: Things looks good so far, it seems backup to S3 is a pretty good solution as data gets into S3 is free, and you know, backups are seldom being read.
